text: MediaCorp Channel 5 or Channel 5 (Chinese: 五频道, Before 1 January 2005: 第五波道) is a 24-hour free-to-air English television channel based in Singapore. Programmes on Channel 5 normally include English language drama (both foreign imports and locally-made), movies, sports, reality show, variety show, news, current affairs and game show programmes. Local editions of overseas programmes like Singapore Idol, Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?, and Deal or No Deal have also been produced. ==Programs== * The Smurfs * The Smurfs: The 2011 Series ==Related pages== *Mediacorp *Mediacorp Channel 8 ==Other websites== * MediaCorp TV Channel 5 Official Website (xinmsn) Category:Television channels in Asia Category:Singaporean culture
title: Mediacorp Channel 5
